english_example_sentence: Last night, I would have continued reading this interesting book.
russian_example_sentence: Прошлой ночью я бы продолжил читать эту интересную книгу.
turkish_example_sentence: Dün gece bu ilginç kitabı okumaya devam edecektim.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Dün gece bu ilginç kitabı okumaya ______.
